import React, { Component } from 'react' import Layout from "./Layout"; import { urlOfImages } from "./images"; import fetch from 'isomorphic-fetch'; class Query extends Component{ constructor() { super(); this.state = { questionList :['swjdbwej'] } } static async getInitialProps() { console.log('ran'); const res = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/questions/'); const questionList = await res.json(); console.log(questionList); return { questionList } } componentDidMount() { console.log(this.state.questionList); this.setState({ questionList: this.props.questionList }) } render(){ return( {this.state.questionList}
